title: Display Stuters
body:
I have tried every thing i know of .. really need help fixing this ! 

http://tinypic.com/r/w02icl/9

replies.body: The issue I'm seeing here could be a problem with your drivers, game files, or a more serious hardware issue.  I suggest going through every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to rule out possibilities and making sure your drivers are updated.  Your PC could also be failing or overheating, so it's important to make sure it's in a good spot to get some good ventilation.  Good luck!
